name: Mr. Mookie and the Runaway Cookie
name_original: Mr. Mookie and the Runaway Cookie
description:
Help Mr. Mookie retrieve his giant cookie in this adorable puzzle-platformer! Glide through the clouds, explore alien lands, and solve complex puzzles to get the cookie and dip it in milk.

Explore Different Lands


Explore five different environments ranging from a cheery, lively playground to a dark, creepy factory as you try to recapture your cookie!

Solve Complex Puzzles


Each of the five chapters has 20 unique, hand-crafted levels, from simple relaxing ones to complex head-scratchers, giving you a wide range of puzzles to complete.

Unique Pickups that Alter Gameplay


Catapult a cookie over castle towers, glide through the clouds with a hang glider, and skyrocket with a jetpack in the factory. Each of the five chapters has different pickups that change how you play the game.

Features

  • Puzzles: Explore 100 hand-crafted levels spread out across five different chapters
  • Increasingly Difficult Puzzles: Each of the levels contains puzzles, ranging from simple relaxing ones to complex head-scratchers
  • Mechanics Build: New mechanics start off easy in earlier levels, then get increasingly difficult, letting you master the different elements of the game
  • Unique Pickups: Each chapter contains their own pickups, like jetpacks, a hang glider, and even a watering can, each one altering the gameplay
